doc.field: New-York Historical Society museum store records
New-York Historical Society museum store records

Includes production of Audubon poster; N-YHS participation in holiday gift shops at Morgan Guaranty and the Municipal Art Society; N-YHS's participation with a booth at the "New York is Book Country" book fair; store purchases for a Paris 1889 exhibition shop; publication of Tales of the Phelps-Dodge Family; product design work by Stephen Saitas; arrangements with Sandak for Audubon and other Slide-Paks; postcard project with Eastern Press; orders for posters for various objects (e.g., Bulls and Bears in the Market) and exhibitions including Government by Choice and Audubon; royalty fees to N-YHS for poster sales; sales of remainders.
New-York Historical Society museum store records
Series I. Correspondence Files >> Set 1. Mc -Sca
